sub_fields.label: Welcome Subtitle
sub_fields.name: welcome_subtitle
sub_fields.default_value: Complete our 30‑second survey to find out if you’re a candidate.

sub_fields.label: Question Title
sub_fields.name: question_title
sub_fields.default_value: How would you describe your teeth?

sub_fields.label: Question Subtitle
sub_fields.name: question_subtitle
sub_fields.default_value: Select the option that fits you best.

sub_fields.label: Upload Subtitle
sub_fields.name: upload_subtitle
sub_fields.default_value: Attach a few clear photos of your teeth.

sub_fields.label: Booking Subtitle
sub_fields.name: booking_subtitle
sub_fields.default_value: Choose a convenient time for your free consultation.

sub_fields.label: Subtitle
sub_fields.name: subtitle
sub_fields.placeholder: Transparent costs, neatly organized in a single PDF.

sub_fields.label: Generate from Pricelist
sub_fields.name: generate_from_pricelist
sub_fields.message: Create PDF from the Pricelist module dynamically

sub_fields.label: Module Subtitle
sub_fields.name: module_subtitle
sub_fields.placeholder: Optional subtitle under the main title

sub_fields.label: Section Intro
sub_fields.name: section_intro
sub_fields.instructions: Shown below tab title and above items/package.

sub_fields.label: Package View
sub_fields.name: package_view
sub_fields.message: Use custom package content instead of items/prices

sub_fields.label: Template Slug (optional)
sub_fields.name: slug
sub_fields.instructions: Used as BEM modifier class hj-package--{slug}

sub_fields.label: Package Content (Visual)
sub_fields.name: package_content
sub_fields.instructions: Shown instead of items/prices when Package View is enabled.

sub_fields.label: Package Content (HTML)
sub_fields.name: package_content_html
sub_fields.instructions: Paste or write raw HTML. It will be output as-is.
